reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app declares the collection of data from users.
reply.reference: We receive and store any information the user enters on the Website or provides to us in any other way. The types of personal information collected include your full name, email address, IP address, browser information, username, password, and any other information necessary for us to provide the Service, including usernames and passwords for your accounts and profiles on third-party sites that the Service works with. N/A. URL: https://terapi.cl/terminos

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that users should be aware of how their personal information is used, shared, and that Mindwell takes privacy seriously. It mentions the collection of information for personalizing services and informs users about changes in the privacy policy.
reply.reference: At Mindwell, we know that you care about how your personal information is used and shared, and that's why we take your privacy seriously. Please read the following to learn more about our privacy policy. By visiting the website www.mindwell.ai and the domain (collectively, the 'Website'), and/or using other linked pages, special features, content, or services that Mindwell offers from time to time (collectively the 'Service'), you agree to the practices and policies described in this Privacy Policy. This Privacy Policy covers Mindwell's treatment of user's personally identifiable information that is gathered when the user accesses the Website and/or uses other features of the Service. N/A. URL: https://terapi.cl/terminos

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can request that their Mindwell account be deleted by following the instructions in the account settings section of the website. It is mentioned that the user should be aware that some information may remain in their files even after the deletion of their account.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users have the option to delete their account and hence opt-out of data collection. However, it also mentions that some information may still be retained even after the account deletion.
reply.reference: The user can request that their Mindwell account be deleted by following the instructions in the account settings section of the website. The user should be aware that some information may remain in our files after the deletion of their account. URL: https://terapi.cl/terminos

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that personal information may be shared with third parties in specific scenarios, ensuring that the user will be notified and given the ability to prevent such sharing.
reply.reference: We may disclose Personal Information when we believe in good faith that it is necessary to comply with the law; enforce or apply our terms of use and other agreements; or protect the rights, property, or safety of Mindwell, our employees, our users, or others. This includes exchanging information with other companies and organizations for fraud protection and credit risk reduction. Except as set forth above, you will be notified when your personal information may be shared with third parties, and you will be able to prevent the sharing of this information. URL: https://terapi.cl/terminos
